name: Five Nights at Tattletail 'n Bendy 2
description:
Five Nights at Tattletail 'n Bendy 2

10 years after the events from the previous game.You have to work in the same location again, but this time a murderous creature is waiting for you.

Tattletail belongs to Waygetter Electronics

Bendy belongs to Joey Drew Studios Inc.

FNaF belongs to Scott Cawthon
